subject: Hurricane Sandy (2012)
Breeders' Cup (Horse Races)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Even without Hurricane Sandy thinning the field, trainer Bob Baffert will likely have a powerful home-course advantage for the Classic at Santa Anita Park with the favorite horse, Game On Dude.
snippet: Even without Hurricane Sandy thinning the field, trainer Bob Baffert will likely have a powerful home-course advantage for the Classic at Santa Anita Park with the favorite horse, Game On Dude.
